website_summaries.verdict: A natural blend of Omega-3 and Omega-9 oils, this formula helps to relieve symptoms and moisturize the irritated area. Be aware, though, that it's applied outside of your eye.
pros: Moisturizing, soothing feeling for irritated eyes
Oils are applied outside of eyes and then gently rubbed into the area
cons: Has an oily feel and may temporarily blur your vision

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My daughter came home with what looked like the start of a bad case of pink eye. I ordered this and received it quickly. Her eye looked great one day after applying it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Effective
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to a server in a Miami Beach restaurant called Puert Sagua . She ( Else ) said it worked like a charm . The product was effective without being obtrusive .
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I use it whenever my eyes feel scratchy, which is often a prelude to an eye infection. This also works on any of my animals who have an infected eye. I very much like this is not a pharmaceutical drug and has no bad side effects, only goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: All natural, no burning drops. Feel great and worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: Busted blood vessel responded to these drops and beet red eyeball improved daily until healed.
customer_reviews.author: Grangranny

customer_reviews.title: Great Topical Healing.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This product has a long shelf life, comes in a nice bottle, and worked amazing on my left eye that was enduring rough allergen reactions and a virus later on. It's easy to use, (topical application on the eyelid, around the eye and below the eye) and causes no harm if it gets in your eye. I even found that it helped the healing process more to allow a little into my eye. Cons: A bit expensive. Another thing to note is that this will not help you any or hardly at all when dealing with a bacterial pink eye infection. Skip the use of this product and go immediately to the doctor if you have bacterial pink eye.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lucent

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on the recommendation of a friend who swore it worked. It most certainly does not and for the money I feel like I got ripped off. At $25 a bottle I feel like I could have applied olive oil to my eyes and gotten the same results. For all I know that is what it is because this certainly DID NOT work in any fashion whatsoever. Feel like I got taken advantage of by a snake oil salesman but it is my fault because I bought it. Shame on me for wasting money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garris

customer_reviews.title: Beware oil you put in your eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is oil you put in your eye,then you cannot even see for hrs ,does not work,why this is sold I have no idea
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mears

customer_reviews.title: My eye was just as bad if not worse after repeated use of this product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. Was extremely messy too. My eye was just as bad if not worse after repeated use of this product. It did not provide relief for any of my pink eye symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey K.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Liquid
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I'm not sure if I had pink eye or conjunctivitis? I was not able to see a doctor, but after 14 days of applying once at night, my symptoms are gone! I would buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great find on Amazon! Works great and did resolved my eyes allergies in few weeks!! Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gica Ranieri

customer_reviews.title: Product leaks during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this works or not because I used it with antibiotic eye drops for my 3 years old. She preferred to use this over the eye drops but the product is expensive, messy and the bottle leaked. First bottle I bought cane and was 1/3 empty but I ordered it again because my daughter liked it and the 2nd bottle was completely empty. They need to seal the bottle better
customer_reviews.author: Candice Graff

customer_reviews.title: But it didn’t feel uncomfortable or painful. It was a bit refreshing actually
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it helped. It did irritate my eyes somewhat and made my eyelids swell. But it didn’t feel uncomfortable or painful. It was a bit refreshing actually.
customer_reviews.author: D. Petree

customer_reviews.title: The product seems nice and to work on my eyes but the lack ...
customer_reviews.text: What is in this thing? there is no phone number or feedback on the bottle. The product seems nice and to work on my eyes but the lack of communication is sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: S & V

customer_reviews.title: Was only temporary releive
customer_reviews.text: This was ok for a few minutes, it didn't work they claim,but we did get a few minutes of relief after use it for pink eye.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Item came damaged. Half empty. Open bottle
customer_reviews.text: Item came HALF EMPTY WITH THE LID SCREWED OFF! Bottle was OPENED when item recieved

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor told me to throw this product away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff I've found to heal eyelid infection. Worked the first day.

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottle and product was almost all gone
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and the bottle had leaked and there was only a little bit left in the bottle. The top is defective and wouldn’t stay closed so the oil leaked all over the bag. I would like a replacement sent to me ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: pumbaaslady1979

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great highly recommend it fixed my pink eye in about 3 days when medicine from the doctors didnt so anything
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: it worked
customer_reviews.text: thank you the bottle was wrapped so it wouldn't break and the product worked as promised

customer_reviews.title: Great product with terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be working well, but packaging was terrible. It had leaked all over, and less than half was left in the bottle. The lid seems to be defective and doesn’t stay on which is why it leaked all over.

customer_reviews.title: was half empty defective bottle
customer_reviews.text: was half empty defective bottle, bought another one and same problem

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my eye doctor due to pink eye problem. So far very happy with the drop. It works as i expected. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Works Great in 2 Days!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Took 2 days for what seemed like pink eye.

customer_reviews.title: Not acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: This product had leaked all over inside the packaging and had to be thrown away.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love this product very much! It works exactly as i excepted. will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: lea

customer_reviews.title: Worked fast
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had Pink eye twice in a row. As soon as Dr's antibiotics tm run out it comes back. I used this and cleared it up in 2 days. After using I did some more research that says you should never use essential oils on your eyes... So I'm feeling a lil unsure about the product. However, it worked... Fast and my 5yr old didn't didn't complain. I'm happy with the outcome.... Just think I'll do some more research before I use it again.
customer_reviews.author: M0mmi3

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: My mom really love this. She said it works as she expected. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Charbi Mourad

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe product or effective product.
customer_reviews.text: Thick oily and I couldn’t get it off my eye. Made my eye swell.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used 3 times and already see a difference. Highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gauntner

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. It was thick and gooey, it made my vision blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Hein

customer_reviews.title: does not work and really does not say whats in ...
customer_reviews.text: does not work and really does not say whats in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jahcinci

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bottle leaked in package and was covered in goo and is only half full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this product for my conjunctivitis
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product for my conjunctivitis, but I ordered another one the other day and was sent the wrong item. I got ointment for tinnitus instead of pink eye, which was disappointing. I was able to get the amount of money credited back to my account, so I ordered another PINKEYE solution. Please send me the item I placed my order for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works well for computer-stressed eyes
customer_reviews.text: Due to a lot of computer work, my eyes are almost always red and feel a bit sore and swollen. My eye doctor told me to take lots of breaks. I bought this instead after reading the comments. I just rubbed it over my eyelids and some of the product got into my eyes. There was no sting and within 10 minutes my eyes felt fine and the redness was almost gone. I had almost forgotten what normal feels like. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: College Bound

customer_reviews.title: Works better and faster than prescription eye drops for pink eye!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband suffered a whole 1 week with prescription eye drops while my eye became better with just 1 use of these drops. I will continue to use it thrice a day 3 drops but I got relief within minutes of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Z

customer_reviews.title: Helped
customer_reviews.text: Very calming, easy to use. My case was too far advanced, but it got me thru work weeks until I could see a doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pettyjohn

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this product even though I only have 2/3 a bottle as it wasnt sealed well.. works good
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it for dry eye
customer_reviews.text: Please note: I do not have pink eye, I didn't think that I did. But I do have very bad eye strain from wearing contacts for over 20 years (and probably not taking them out as often as I should have) and staring at computers for even longer. This product is a blessing for tired, dry, itchy, bloodshot eyes! It does not irritate and it feels so soothing. I will be purchasing a second bottle to use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Worked!!! Soothing!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked!!! Worked way better than the homeopathic drops I got from Wal-Mart (which are also available on Amazon), which those drops did nothing. 3 kids got pink eye. Then I got it. Entire bottle cured us all. Check the listing to make sure you have the type of pink eye this will resolve, you may need antibiotics if it is another type. My kids didnt even mind these drops. They are soothing and thick drops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: after the very poor description and how to use the product
customer_reviews.text: Ok... after the very poor description and how to use the product! Because people like me needs more specific instructions... I used it inside as a normal eye drops and got blind for a few minutes! The label should have the words: Apply outside the eye !!! It worked... I had a very irritated eye and it was very uncomfortable! I used it probably 2 days and voila no more dry eye
customer_reviews.author: MARIA E GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do squat for me.. My Eye got worse! DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Applied to the outside per the directions. What a waste of money. DON"T BUY THIS. IT MADE MY EYE WORSE! I went to the doctor and got some real medicine and now my pink eye is almost gone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad case of pink eye. Tried for a few days , no change.
customer_reviews.author: classic lady

customer_reviews.title: Spilled product
customer_reviews.text: Received Good eye Pink eye product today. Unfortunately the cap was not tight on the bottle and product was absorbed into cardboard mailing box and coated my other purchases. Mess ! 1/2 inch left in bottle. Paid $19.00 !!!! Please make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne LoPinto

customer_reviews.title: However it dried her eye area
customer_reviews.text: it realny helped for my daughter's pink eye. Anyhow, it really dried her eye Area
customer_reviews.author: KAROLINA

customer_reviews.title: Good, but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Do not put a drop of this on your eye. Touch the dropper to your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Janice G. Tibbitts

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: it was very soothing, a little pricey,but in a few days neye started healing well.
